name: Kayla Eschenburg
text: Use to be good. Don’t know what happened after the last year but the quality has gone downhill. My well done pizza was not well done. The cheese tasted like rubber. The pizza was soggy and soaked in grease. Ordered a large and got the …More

text: Unfortunately, I'm dropping to 4 stars. I don't blame the whole staff for one bad experience. However, our pizza was on the road for over 45 minutes based on the tracker. We're only 5 minutes away and even on busy nights in the past, it …More

text: If i could give no stars i would. I ordered a pizza and a bread stick for delivery and they told me it would be ready in 35-40 minutes a little long for 9pm but i didn't complain. text: Great pizza, I especially love the free flavored crust. I appreciate that they deliver late. We were expecting a 40 minute wait on the delivery, and it only took 25. Great service and quality pizza.

text: The last two to three times that I got pizza from here, they went WAY too light on the toppings.  Too little sauce, and put next to nothing on the flavored crust. …More

name: magworks 7
text: I ordered their 5 dollar small with 2 item deal. Seems that they chinsed on the toppings. With delivery and tip,I paid $11.00 The pizza didnt taste bad,but it did'nt seem like a deal to me. I got what I paid for...A 5 dollar mediocre pizza.

name: Christina Brennan
text: Most the time everything is great! Once in awhile the bread may be slightly underdone or looks rushed. Delivery is fast and the drivers are always pleasant. Deals are pretty good at times. Much better than other options in the area!

name: Katie Smiley
text: This is the second time in probably two months I've tried this Hungry Howies and will never go back. There was absolutely no flavor and no sauce, hardly any pepperoni. Just not good.

name: Gustavia Jones
text: GREAT JOB. I was a Hungry Howie...lol and called cause I was impatient.  They were professional and delivered with an EXCELLENT PIZZA! Thank you.

text: I absolutely love this place... One of the employees who is Caucasian I love her because she makes my antipasta salad the way I love it. As soon as I find out her name im going to give her a personal review... Also I be loading up on food …More

text: I usually go & get Italian Subs. They have a special of BOGO coupon on Tuesdays. They are really good & cheap. My sister is a fan of the steak & cheese subs.

text: This location is Terrible. Ordered online delivery twice and both times it took them and hour and a half to deliver my pizza. when it did show up it wasn't cooked like I wanted and it was cold. Most definitely will not be ordering from this location ever again. Wish I could Give zero stars!!!!

text: It a simple thing the think crust with mushrooms & sesame dipped in the Howies marinara sauce. Love it

text: Horrible wait time. Over a half an hour. What did my wife get for her troubles while a group of hungry kids waited? A soda. We will NOT be going back. Very unprofessional.

text: Ordered a large deep dish and it was probably the worst pizza I've ever seen and tasted. Not only that but I got a Cesar salad with Italian dressing instead of the Greek that I ordered.

text: It took an hour and a half for my cold pizza to be delivered on a Sunday night. I asked for butter cheese on the crust. By the time it arrived, the only place there was butter was the pizza box where it had soaked into. Not impressed.

name: Steven Grillo
text: Read most of the reviews on this location and all the 1 stars are spot on. I would not recommend this location to anybody. After waitin 1hr20min on a 45min delivery the store called and asked if the order was delivered. When they were told …More
